entry.source: Here is this Training Battle's goal:{F801}{F804,5}Defeat an enemy that absorbs all{F801}kinds of attacks within ten turns!{F804,0}{F801}I have invited a special guest trainer{F801}to participate in this exercise. Use{F801}this opportunity to learn a thing or{F801}two from a legendary warrior.{F801}Give the next challenge a shot.{F801}{F804,5}Use your ability to switch demons to damage the enemy demons,{F801}and defeat them within 10 turns!{F804,0}{F801}
